sentences.en: Chatterbox will help build children's expressive and social skills in a fun and easy way.
sentences.cn: ,帮助您的小朋友建立沟通技巧及社交能力.

sentences.en: Further down is the chatterbox in Apt 28 who always has her door open and jumps out and distracts you, just as you’re trying to get somewhere.
sentences.cn: 接下来是28号一个喋喋不休的女人，她常常把房门开着，突然跳出来拦住你的去路，就当你要去哪儿的时候。

sentences.en: I was a chatterbox at school.
sentences.cn: 上学那会儿，我是个话痨。

sentences.en: In its default configuration, NAB is a real chatterbox.
sentences.cn: 在默认设定下, NAB真是喋喋不休.

sentences.en: Listening can be more valuable than chatterbox.
sentences.cn: 与其唠唠叨叨,不如多倾听.

sentences.en: Therefore, parents in the chatterbox, or went about cleaning your own house it.
sentences.cn: 所以, 在对父母喋喋不休之前, 还是先去打扫一下你自己的屋子吧.

sentences.en: You will be a real chatterbox this week.
sentences.cn: 本周巨蟹会喋喋不休的唠叨.

words.tran_cn: 唠叨；饶舌；（动物的）啁啾声；潺潺流水声
饶舌的人；喋喋不休的人
唠叨；喋喋不休；（动物等）吱吱叫
喋喋不休地说；使卡嗒卡嗒作声

trans.tran_en: someone, especially a child, who talks too much
